flawed_nl_solution:
The salesman sold 17 bags for 17 bags x $18/bag = $<<17*18=306>>306
He sold 10 more for 10 bags x $25/bag = $<<10*25=250>>250
Thus far he has sold 17 bags + 10 bags = <<17+10=31>>31 bags
Therefore he sold 48 bags - 31 bags = <<48-31=17>>17 bags for $22 each
17 bags were sold for 17 bags x $22/bag = $<<17*22=374>>374
In total the salesman made $306 + $250 + $374 = $<<306+250+374=930>>930
The salesman made $930 - $576 = $<<930-576=354>>354 in profit.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 27, not 31. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
